body: Octavius White lived and was active in Canada. He typically painted realistic landscape views of mountain scenes and waterfalls, such as this vibrant composition of Niagara Falls. His works have been sold at such fine venues as Ritchies Canadian Art Auction and Sothebyâ€™s Toronto
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 21.5 x 35.5 inches / Signed lower left
